Message:
The girl had lost
all of her memories,
so we decided to let her
stay with us for the time being.

She didn’t know her own name,
or where she lived.

Even my mother said
she’d never seen a girl
so beautiful before.

The girl’s eyes were the color
of when sunset meets night,
and they were so pretty
I could hardly look away.

Inspired by a tulip
of the same color,
I decided to call her Grita.

Even after night fell,
Grita still seemed nervous.

What could I do
to cheer her up...?
...Ah!

“Want to go to
the Flower Festival
with me tomorrow?

There’ll be loads of
people and flowers,
so they say it’s
a must-see event!”

After thinking for a moment,
Grita gave a small nod.

She still seems
a bit uncomfortable,
but I hope that soon,
she’ll be able to smile again!
